title: Do you think Riot would ever change the layout of the GD board just for us?
body:
The cramped feel is not holding up well with me. It feels like the right half of my screen is just wasted, and if I spend too long browsing I feel my neck stiffen. 

The condensed formatting is pointless when there's not enough information to be worth condensing. Maybe on the redditesque side of things it looks better, but for a more typical forum it's just so... off.

It's an uncomfortable shift from old GD, I can deal with change but boards just feels like a downgrade.
